Title: La mujer de todos
Writer: Alexandre Dumas fils (novel), Julio Bracho, Mauricio Magdaleno, Antonio Momplet, Robert Thoeren (play), Xavier Villaurrutia
Actors: María Félix, Armando Calvo, Gloria Lynch, Alberto Galán
Plot: A beautiful woman of affairs falls in love with a handsome young man of great promise. Fearing for his future, the man's father begs her to leave his son so that her reputation will not hold him back.
